column2: VARDESC
Parent Completing Form
Parent Completing Form: Other, specify
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You have a friendly talk with your child.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You let your child know when he/she is doing a good job with something.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You threaten to punish your child and then do not actually punish him/her.

Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You volunteer to help with special activities that your child is involved in (such as sports, boy/girl scouts, church youth groups).
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You reward or give something extra to your child for obeying you or behaving well.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. Your child fails to leave a note or let you know where he/she is going.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You play games or do other fun things with your child.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. Your child talks you out of being punished after he/she has done something wrong.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You ask your child about his/her day in school.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. Your child stays out in the evening past the time he/she is supposed to be home.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You help your child with his/her homework.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You feel that getting your child to obey you is more trouble than it’s worth.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You compliment your child when he/she does something well.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You ask your child what his/her plans are for the coming day.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You drive your child to a special activity.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You praise your child if he/she behaves well.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. Your child is out with friends you don’t know.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You hug or kiss your child when he/she does something well.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. Your child goes out without a set time to be home.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You talk to your child about his/her friends.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. Your child is out after dark without an adult with him/her.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You let your child out of a punishment early (like lift restrictions earlier than you originally said).
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. Your child helps plan family activities.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You get so busy that you forget where your child is and what he/she is doing.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. Your child is not punished when he/she has done something wrong.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You attend PTA meetings, parent/teacher conferences, or other meetings at your child’s school.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You tell your child that you like it when he/she helps out around the house.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You don’t check that your child comes home at the time she/he was supposed to.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You don’t tell your child where you are going.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. Your child comes home from school more than an hour past the time you expect him/her.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. The punishment you give your child depends on your mood.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. Your child is at home without adult supervision.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You spank your child with your hand when he/she has done something wrong.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You ignore your child when he/she is misbehaving.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You slap your child when he/she has done something wrong.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You take away privileges or money from your child as a punishment.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You send your child to his/her room as a punishment.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You hit your child with a belt, switch, or other object when he/she has done something wrong.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You yell or scream at your child when he/she has done something wrong.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You calmly explain to your child why his/her behavior was wrong when he/she misbehaves.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You use time out (make him/her sit or stand in a corner) as a punishment.
Please rate each item as to how often it TYPICALLY occurs in your home. You give your child extra chores as a punishment.
